rule.title: Bravo's Brew
rule.line: This flask of foaming beer grants courage. You gain an item bonus to Will saves for the duration, with a greater bonus against fear.

variant.line: The bonus on Will saves is +1, or +2 against fear.

rule.title: Potion of Resistance
rule.line: Drinking this thick, fortifying potion grants resistance against a single damage type for the duration. Each potion of resistance is created to defend against acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage (and is called a lesser potion of fire resistance or the like).

variant.line: You gain resistance 5 to the appropriate energy type.
